history.proof: intros a b. unfold is_gcd. destruct (gcd_exists a b) as [d Hd]. hauto lq: on unfold: gcd, is_gcd.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros a b. unfold is_gcd. destruct (gcd_exists a b) as [d Hd]. split. - apply Hd. - intros d' H. apply (proj2 (Hd d' H)).
